Package tk.airshipcraft.commonlib.utils.cooldowns

Interface IKVCoolDownHandler<E,K>

Type Parameters:
E - Object that cooldowns are assigned to
K - Key identifying the type of cooldown
All Known Implementing Classes:
KVTickCoolDownHandler
public interface IKVCoolDownHandler<E,K>
Interface defining the contract for cooldown handlers.
Author:
Maxopoly, notzune

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    long
    getRemainingCoolDown(E e, K k)
    Gets the remaining cooldown of the given item for a specific action.
    long
    getSpecificCoolDown(E e, K k)
    Gets a specific cooldown duration based on the key for a given object.
    long
    getTotalCoolDown()
    Gives the total cooldown set for this instance.
    boolean
    onCoolDown(E e, K k)
    Checks whether the given object is currently on cooldown in this instance for a specific action.

  • Method Details

    • putOnCoolDown

      void putOnCoolDown(E e, K k)
      Puts the specified object on cooldown for a specific action.
      Parameters:
      e - Object to set cooldown for
      k - Key identifying the type of cooldown

    • onCoolDown

      boolean onCoolDown(E e, K k)
      Checks whether the given object is currently on cooldown in this instance for a specific action.
      Parameters:
      e - Object to check
      k - Key identifying the type of cooldown
      Returns:
      True if the object is on cooldown, false if not

    • getRemainingCoolDown

      long getRemainingCoolDown(E e, K k)
      Gets the remaining cooldown of the given item for a specific action. The actual meaning of this number depends on the implementation, but may never be less than 0 and never higher than the predefined maximum cooldown.
      Parameters:
      e - Object to get cooldown for
      k - Key identifying the type of cooldown
      Returns:
      The cooldown left for the given object or 0 if none exists

    • getTotalCoolDown

      long getTotalCoolDown()
      Gives the total cooldown set for this instance. Again the actual meaning of this value depends on the implementation.
      Returns:
      Maximum cooldown in this instance

    • removeCooldown

      void removeCooldown(E e, K k)
      Removed the cooldown for the given object for a specific action.
      Parameters:
      e - Object to check
      k - Key identifying the type of cooldown

    • getSpecificCoolDown

      long getSpecificCoolDown(E e, K k)
      Gets a specific cooldown duration based on the key for a given object.
      Parameters:
      e - The object to get the cooldown for.
      k - The key identifying the cooldown.
      Returns:
      The specific cooldown duration in ticks, or 0 if the object is not on cooldown for the specified key.
